tip_short: ğŸ“ Near Hanging Dog Ranch â†’ Dead hunter's body

text: Jack Hall Map 1: Buy from Maximo

text: Poisonous Trail Map 1: Cairn Lake Cabin
tip_short: ğŸ“ Cairn Lake cabin â†’ Lockbox under bed

tip_short: ğŸ“ Face Rock N of Rhodes â†’ Burned tree stump at base

tip_short: ğŸ“ Snake mound W of Van Horn â†’ Rock pile on top

tip_short: ğŸ“ Limpany jailhouse â†’ Corpse inside

text: Le Tresor Map 2: Saint Denis Docks

tip_short: ğŸ“ Near Window Rock â†’ Tree with Earth symbol

tip_short: ğŸ“ Elysian Pool area â†’ Tree with Water symbol
tip_detailed: Another carved tree awaits in the Elysian Pool area, marked with the Water symbol. Follow the pattern.

tip_short: ğŸ“ Fort Brennand area â†’ Tree with Fire symbol

tip_short: ğŸ“ Mount Shann summit â†’ Behind sundial â†’ 2 GOLD BARS

text: Torn Map Half 1: Manito Glade Hermit

tip_detailed: The first map half is at Manito Glade, north of Annesburg. That aggressive hermit with the shotgun guards it. Check the drawer inside.

tip_detailed: North of Cotorra Springs, a wrecked train lies in the gorge. Search the baggage car for a lockbox containing one gold bar.

tip_short: ğŸ“ Limpany burned town â†’ Sheriff desk lockbox â†’ May respawn
tip_detailed: The burned town of Limpany holds treasure in the sheriff's office. Check the desk lockbox. Some say this gold bar respawns!

tip_short: âš ï¸ EPILOGUE â†’ Hennigan's Stead â†’ SE of MacFarlane's

tip_short: ğŸ“ Flat Iron Lake near Rhodes â†’ Special Lake Lure

tip_short: âš ï¸ EPILOGUE â†’ San Luis River â†’ Special Lake Lure

tip_short: ğŸ“ Owanjila Lake near Strawberry â†’ Special Lake Lure
tip_detailed: Fish for this legendary bass at Owanjila Lake near Strawberry. Special Lake Lure required.

tip_short: ğŸ“ Aurora Basin â†’ Tall Trees â†’ Special Lake Lure

tip_short: âš ï¸ EPILOGUE â†’ Rio Bravo, New Austin â†’ Special River Lure

tip_short: ğŸ“ Elysian Pool â†’ Roanoke Ridge â†’ Special Lake Lure
tip_detailed: Drop a line in Elysian Pool in Roanoke Ridge for this legendary perch. Special Lake Lure needed.

tip_short: ğŸ“ Dakota River near Valentine â†’ Special River Lure

tip_short: ğŸ“ O'Creagh's Run â†’ Same lake as Hamish â†’ Special Lake Lure

tip_short: ğŸ“ Lagras â†’ Bayou Nwa swamp â†’ Special Swamp Lure

tip_short: ğŸ“ Lake Isabella â†’ Far north â†’ Special Lake Lure

tip_short: ğŸ“ Flat Iron Lake â†’ South of Rhodes â†’ Special Lake Lure
tip_detailed: Fish the deep waters of Flat Iron Lake, south of Rhodes, for this legendary sturgeon. Special Lake Lure.

tip_short: ğŸ“ Valentine â†’ Rocks near Dakota River â†’ ALIVE only

tip_short: ğŸ“ Valentine â†’ Wallace Station NW â†’ Alive $50, Dead $25

tip_short: ğŸ“ Rhodes â†’ Bluewater Marsh â†’ Gang backup

tip_short: ğŸ“ Rhodes â†’ Caliga Hall area â†’ Dangerous

tip_short: ğŸ“ Rhodes â†’ Saint Denis saloon â†’ Persuasive

tip_short: ğŸ“ Strawberry â†’ Abandoned mine NW â†’ Dangerous

tip_short: ğŸ“ Strawberry â†’ Gang leader â†’ Stealth recommended

tip_short: ğŸ“ Saint Denis â†’ Fort Brennand SW of Van Horn â†’ Dead or Alive

tip_short: ğŸ“ Saint Denis â†’ Industrial area â†’ Serial arsonist

tip_short: âš ï¸ EPILOGUE â†’ Blackwater â†’ W of Beecher's Hope â†’ Alive $65, Dead $35

tip_short: âš ï¸ EPILOGUE â†’ Blackwater â†’ Serial killer type â†’ Heavy weapons

tip_short: âš ï¸ EPILOGUE â†’ Blackwater â†’ MacFarlane's Ranch area

tip_short: âš ï¸ EPILOGUE â†’ Tumbleweed â†’ Del Lobo connection â†’ Alive $60, Dead $30

tip_short: âš ï¸ EPILOGUE â†’ Tumbleweed â†’ Mine SW â†’ Multiple gang members
tip_detailed: This Mexican outlaw's hiding in a mine southwest of Tumbleweed with his gang. Worth $65 either way.

tip_detailed: Find Emmet Granger's pig farm east of Flatneck Station. He'll make you shovel pig dung first. Then duel him proper.

tip_detailed: The final hunt with Hamish. A giant boar takes his life, partner. Kill the beast and inherit his beloved horse Buell as his last wish.

tip_short: ğŸ“ Willard's Rest â†’ N of Annesburg â†’ Ch6 â†’ âš ï¸ MISSABLE
tip_detailed: Find the grieving widow Charlotte at Willard's Rest. Teach her to survive in the wilderness across 3 visits. Beautiful storyline.

tip_detailed: A letter arrives at camp from Arthur's old flame Mary. Emotional storyline spanning chapters 2, 4, and 6. Don't miss the final theater meeting.

tip_short: ğŸ“ Algernon Wasp in Saint Denis â†’ Ch4+ â†’ VERY GRINDY
tip_detailed: Help that eccentric milliner Algernon Wasp collect exotic orchids and bird plumes. 5 parts of tedious collecting. Worth it for the golden revolver!

tip_short: ğŸ“ Deborah MacGuiness SE of camp â†’ Find 30 bones â†’ Mail locations

tip_detailed: Visit the strange Francis Sinclair at his cabin. Something's not right with that fella... Find 10 rock carvings. The ending is... unexpected.
